name: broadcasts
description:
Pulsating broadcasts spiraling about noisy polygons.

Requires a WebGL2 enabled browser.

## Instructions

- Press Space or click to generate new art.
- Press P to pause and play the animation.
- Press B to toggle the background color.
- Press F to toggle the frame off and on.
- Press 1..9 to change the speed at which new art is generated, press 0 to stop.
- Increase or decrease the resolution of the art by changing the browser zoom level.
- The seed value for each generation is logged to the dev console.
- Right click to save a still image at the current canvas resolution.

## URL Query Parameters

- ?seed=12345 to fix the art to a specific seed.
- ?speed=1 to fix the speed at which new art is generated.
- ?background=0 to fix the background color to black.
- ?background=1 to fix the background color to white.
- ?frame=true to enable drawing of the frame.
- ?frame=false to disable drawing of the frame.
